name: Piss Off
description:
Piss Off is a party-fighting game where your weapon is your pee! 2-4 players battle in arenas that become more slippery as piss gets everywhere. It's easy to learn, but hard to master. Precise aiming and expert platforming are required to come out on top. 

Piss off is made for friends who want to laugh, scream, and party. Don't worry, it's not a kinky thing, unless you want it to be ;)

Sadly, at this point a controller is required to play, BUT the game is still in development, so a single player mode and will come in the future.

If you like Piss Off, join the GHOSTMEAT PARTY PALACE on Discord, where we can test the game together, hang out, and party! It's not just my server, its a game development community, so join and share things that you're working on!

Song Credits:

"To A Theater Near You", CertainlyCaro https://certainlycaro.newgrounds.com/

"Challenger", HOJL https://hojl.newgrounds.com/

"Power Move" , James the Mutt https://jamesthemuttz.newgrounds.com/
